item.title: Good quick overview of how to build a question/answering app over audio data!

The demo below is really interesting for a few reasons:

ğŸ¦œUses local LLMs (seems like @MistralAI via @ollama)

Even more exciting to us though... it changes up the UX! It's not just simply a chat text box

Super creative and practical


TonyMo:â€‚ğŸš€ Just playing with chatbot for @Decentraland, powered by LLM! ğŸ¤– Fully localized with @OLLAMA , @LangChainAI , and @MistralAI, plus #RAG integration for PDF and web page.

Check out this video showcasing bot in action, inspired by @DecentralGames ' documentation. #AI + #web3
